1.title: The Reunion

episode of.title: Doctor Who: The Young Doctor Chronicles (TV Series 2018)

1.plot: Six months after the Young Doctor disappeared, he finally reappears outside Josh's house in great pain. When Josh attempts to investigate, he finds himself pulled into a time loop.

2.title: Day of the Mekkons

episode of.title: Doctor Who: The Young Doctor Chronicles (TV Series 2018)

2.plot: Restarting their travels through time and space, the Young Doctor and Josh arrive on the planet, Starbux, where Bartok is rebuilding his plans for the Mekkon Empire.

3.title: Almost Human

episode of.title: Doctor Who: The Young Doctor Chronicles (TV Series 2018)

3.plot: After waking up from a nightmare, John Smith returns to his normal life at college. However, the day passes, his life changes in strange ways, proving that he may actually be the Young Doctor himself.

4.title: Insurrection of the Daleks

episode of.title: Doctor Who: The Young Doctor Chronicles (TV Series 2018)

4.plot: After crashing into the middle of the Dalek invasion on a space-station, the Young Doctor and Josh attempt to stop this incursion before it's too late.

1.title: The Cyber Experiment

episode of.title: Doctor Who: The Young Doctor Chronicles (TV Series 2018)

1.plot: After landing in the 1980s with his new companion, Josh, the Young Doctor discovers a series of disappearances happening within U.N.I.T.

2.title: The Dream Room

episode of.title: Doctor Who: The Young Doctor Chronicles (TV Series 2018)

2.plot: Deciding to take a break from the danger, the Young Doctor and Josh arrive on a leisure planet. However after their latest installation, the company behind the leisure planet must call upon help to solve these random deaths.

3.title: Double Trouble

episode of.title: Doctor Who: The Young Doctor Chronicles (TV Series 2018)

3.plot: After Josh decides to go on a break, the Young Doctor meets his future incarnation - The Brash Doctor.
